messages.title: THE CHOICE FOR OUR NHS
messages.content: A BETTER FUTURE WITH THE LIB DEMS OR LABOUR WHO ARE TOO WEAK AND DIVIDED TO FIGHT FOR OUR NHS.

messages.title: 1P EXTRA ON INCOME TAX...
messages.content: ...MEANS £6BILLION EXTRA TO BOOST OUR NHS AND SOCIAL CARE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by 1p to raise an estimated £6 billion per year earmarked for the NHS and social care.

issues.health: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by 1p to raise an estimated £6 billion per year earmarked for the NHS and social care.
